query.queryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND (( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' AND [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] CONTAINS '[HSW-uWS-CT]' ) OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\uInnovation' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' OR [System.NodeName] = 'Report' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'AppCom', 'AppCommon', 'App2') AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] CONTAINS '[SWBU_69_SP4]' AND [System.State] IN ('New', 'Assigned') AND ( [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] = '' OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today ) ORDER BY [System.NodeName], [System.State]

select [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.NodeName], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.CreatedDate] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and (([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]') or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\uInnovation' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\MCSF1' or [System.NodeName] = 'Report') and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and ([System.State] = 'New' or [System.State] = 'Assigned') and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D') and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_71]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_R2]' and not [System.AssignedTo] contains 'CCB' order by [System.State], [System.NodeName]

SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [System.State] IN ('Assigned', 'New') AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] CONTAINS '[SWBU_69SP4_Innovation]' AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Acute Brain Analysis', 'FFR') AND ( [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] > '2021-01-13T00:00:00.0000000' ) AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\uInnovation' AND [System.AssignedTo] NOT CONTAINS 'CCB' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]

SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [System.State] IN ('Assigned', 'New') AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Acute Brain Analysis', 'FFR') AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_69SP4_Innovation]' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_71]' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\uInnovation' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]

SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND (((( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' AND [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] CONTAINS '[HSW-uWS-CT]' ) OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\CT\For HSW' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\MR\uMR\MCSF' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU' ) AND ( [System.IterationPath] UNDER 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP4' OR [System.IterationPath] UNDER 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP3' )) OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\uInnovation' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom', 'Acute Brain Analysis') AND [System.CreatedDate] >= @today ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]
query.additionalqueryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND (((( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' AND [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] CONTAINS '[HSW-uWS-CT]' ) OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\CT\For HSW' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\MR\uMR\MCSF' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU' ) AND ( [System.IterationPath] UNDER 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP4' OR [System.IterationPath] UNDER 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP3' )) OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\uInnovation' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom', 'Acute Brain Analysis') AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today AND [System.State] IN ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Closed') ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]
